headline.main: No Doubting Thomas as Ace Boosts Him to WGC Lead
headline.print_headline: No Doubting Thomas as Ace Boosts Him to WGC Lead

lead_paragraph: A hole-in-one boosted Justin Thomas to the lead after a wild third round at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City on Saturday, but three of the biggest names in the game are breathing down his neck.
snippet: A hole-in-one boosted Justin Thomas to the lead after a wild third round at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City on Saturday, but three of the biggest names in the game are breathing down his neck....
